title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 1552/94 of 30 June 1994 amending Regulation (EEC) No 2164/92 laying down detailed rules for the application of the specific supply arrangements for the Canary Islands relating to milk products and establishing the forecast supply balance
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 1552/94 of 30 June 1994 amending Regulation (EEC) No 2164/92 laying down detailed rules for the application of the specific supply arrangements for the Canary Islands relating to milk products and establishing the  forecast supply balance
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Annex I to Regulation (EEC) No 2164/92 is replaced by the Annex to this Regulation.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the third day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
It shall apply with effect from 1 July 1994.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 30 June 1994.
For the Commission
RenĂŠ STEICHEN
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 173, 27. 6. 1992, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 180, 23. 7. 1993, p. 26.
(3) OJ No L 179, 1. 7. 1992, p. 1.
(4) OJ No L 238, 23. 9. 1993, p. 24.
(5) OJ No L 217, 31. 7. 1992, p. 17.
(6) OJ No L 144, 9. 6. 1994, p. 9.
